animeTitle: Demon Asura Becomes a 5 Year Old Loli
otherNames: Demon Asura Becomes a 5 Year Old Loli, El diablo tiene cinco años y medio, The Devil is Five and a Half Years Old, 万恶魔头五岁半, 万恶魔头五岁半·动态漫
synopsis: The Demon Queen Asura whom many fear just hearing her name turns into a child overnight and bullied? Oppressed? Assassinated? Impossible! Not happening! Hey, you trash cultivator, be honored that you are tasked to send this deity back home!
